roleset.name: make feel disgust, ill, disgusted
roleset.note: SICKEN-V NOTES: Framed by Neville based on brown. Member of VNcls amuse-31.1, change_bodily_state-40.8.4, marvel-31.3-1, marvel-31.3-6, other_cos-45.4. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from sicken.01-v)
SICKENING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from sickening.01-j)

example.name: passive, no agent
example.text: Watson-1 turned away , [*-1]-2 sickened *trace*-2 for the first time in many months .
example.arg: for the first time in many months

example.name: passive, with agent
example.text: In the brief moment to talk to them before I took my post on the ring of defenses , I indicated I-1 was sickened [*-1] by the methods men employed to live and trade on the river .
example.arg: by the methods men employed to live and trade on the river

example.name: with empty it
example.text: it *EXP*-1 sickens me [to think I missed the party]-1
example.arg: to think I missed the party

example.name: arg0-disease
example.text: In 2003, plague sickened 2,118 people in nine countries, killing 182 of them, according to the Geneva-based WHO.

roleset.name: macabre, gruesome, disgusting
roleset.note: SICK-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from sick.02-j)

example.name: the arg
example.text: Spitting in someone's face is sick and disgusting.

roleset.name: really amazingly cool. dude.
roleset.note: SICK-J NOTES: Added by Julia. (from sick.03-j)

example.name: the arg
example.text: This tune is really sick, bro!

example.name: both args
example.text: I'm so sick of his stupid face already.

roleset.name: ill, disgusted
roleset.note: SICK-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, sicken-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls amuse-31.1, change_bodily_state-40.8.4, marvel-31.3-1, marvel-31.3-6, other_cos-45.4. (from sick.01-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: If you are sick with flu-like illness, CDC recommends that you stay home for at least 24 hours after your fever is gone

example.name: both args with ADV
example.text: After the birth of our first child it was time for me to go back to work and I was sick with worry about who could possibly care for my child.
example.arg: about who could possibly care for my child
